radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent subsegmental atelectasis at the lung bases, otherwise clear. Fatty infiltration of the liver. A 4.0 x 3.8 cm hypodense lesion in the interpolar region of the right kidney, compatible with a cyst. Small appendicolith in right lower quadrant with surrounding halo of inflammation. Scattered diverticula in the descending colon. No free air or fluid in the abdomen. Mild sigmoid diverticulosis. Degenerative change at L5-S1.
